name: Elemental Titans：3D Idle Arena
description:
Choose your Element and wage war against Darkness in this 3D Idle Fantasy RPG!


[Raise your Animon!]
The newly released pet system – Animon! Animons are magical creatures with a variety of forms. Once an Animon is paired with a Titan, they could become a strong aid in battles. You can pray at the Animon fountain to collect Animon Eggs. Hatch them and you might get wonderful creatures such as blizzard Phoenix, stellar deer, thunder duck, and perhaps… dragons?

[Choose your Element!]
Choose from a total of 6 elements to form your team. Every titan has its own elemental affinity which can be enhanced by fellow titans of the same element. Light and Dark titans are the most versatile by opening more opportunities in team composition.

[Classic Puzzles and Mini-games]
Elemental Titans boasts a collection of your favorite puzzles and mini games as daily missions. Take to the skies with Dragon Jump, or run the mile with Frog Jump; Try your luck at Sinopoly or the Mines! The most exciting and rewarding mode would be the Burning Hollow, where you experience three stages of "Mine Sweeper", but with a twist, requiring tactics and skill.

[Simple 3D Controls & Real-Time Combat]
Elemental Titans creates a unique 3D circular arena where players control their team with the swipe of the finger! This allows for the battlefield to effectively gain spatial depth, creating many extraordinary mechanics.

[Non-stop Co-op Raids and Dungeons]
Players are truly able to experience co-op raids and dungeons in its entirety with the aforementioned 3D mechanics. Elemental Titans’ 5-man, 10-man co-op raids, things truly do get pretty crazy! This is the endgame for all players and where everyone gets their moment to shine. Do you wanna raid a dungeon?
